description: Brice was at a gay club and spotted one of the sexiest straight boys he had ever seen in his life. This hunky straight dude, Alec, was there with his girlfriend. But Brice is the kinda guy that always gets what he wants. And he wanted Alec. He wanted Alec's big, straight boy dick shoved up his ass, over and over again. He managed to get Alec alone without his girlfriend and gave him a taste of what a gay boy can do with his mouth. Alec was so pleased that he decided if a gay boy's mouth could feel so good what must his ass be like. And his instinct was correct. Brice's ass blew Alec's virgin mind and load.
title: Back For More
